title: [RESOLVED] Login Issues and Client Disconnection - 02/02/2016
body:
We're currently aware that there are issues with attempting to log on, starting games and end of games. We're investigating this issue and will update this thread with more information when possible.

**UPDATES:**

**5:05 PM AEDT** - The issues with logging on to the game have been resolved - and ranked is no longer disabled.

replies.body: I seem to still be having this issue, or some similar one. Disconnected as champ select ended (countdown got to 0 and then nothing happened), and upon restarting the client I can no longer log in. This message ( http://imgur.com/NJ3II9o ) appears after a couple of minutes each time. As far as I can tell my connection is fine and nothing but LoL is affected, and disabling firewall/antivirus doesn't resolve the issue.
well. I tried to play, but it keeps on disconnecting every 2 mins and says "reconnecting to chat service" and cant load any games. is this just my comps problem or the servers? Plz help

hey, can you tell us what happened, people would rather be curious?
was this a ddos attack or something similar?
Not working yea, tried but no work. Played a game on NA fine but it just seems to be OCE that is having trouble ;~;
Sorry mate but this is not resolved
Yeah doesn't seem to be fixed buddy
It's doing it again. No one on OCE can log in........
It's doing it again. No one on OCE can log in........

When I started a game yesterday/day before I got a Leaver Buster because it didn't connect... I was waiting for literally 15 or so minutes because my computer went to sleep, when I logged back on it told me to reconnect and 8 minutes of the game had gone by! I was sad, but now I am working it off as I type!

P.S i was playing {{champion:78}}
soooooo i still cant get onto the log in screen?? nothing happens when i press launch?? help ????
Ranked is up as far as I can tell. What trouble are you having accessing the mode?
